notes: Team chat, workspaces, channles, many intergrations available
Scheduling calendar events from Google Calendar
For cloud encryption. "Boxcryptor encrypts your sensitive files and folders in Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive and many other cloud storages."

"Part spreadsheet, part database, and entirely flexible, teams use Airtable to organize their work, their way." This can be used in many different ways. It can also be used as a task or project organisation system, or CRM
Great for agendas and notes. Markdown syntax, embed various types of media, Dropbox files, &c. Create quick slides. I prefer Google Docs for project "hubs" or collaborative writing
Time tracking tool. Start, stop, capture. See how you spend your time
One suggestion for organising taks and projects. Boards, lists, cards
For sending tasks to your Trello board from G-mail

"Connect your apps and automate workflows. Easy automation for busy people. Zapier moves info between your web apps automatically, so you can focus on your most important work." Example: When I star an email in Gmail, add the email as a card on my "inbox" list in Trello"
A lovely note taking application  (iPhone, iPad, and Mac)
"A note-taking tool for networked thought. As easy to use as a document. As powerful as a graph database. Roam helps you organize your research for the long haul." Non-linear note-taking
